import { Component } from 'react' import React from 'react' import BeersService from '../../service/beers.service' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import './BeerDetails.css' class BeerDetails extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { beer: undefined } this.beerService = new BeersService() } componentDidMount() { const { beer_id } = this.props.match.params this.beerService .getRandomBeer(beer_id) .then(response => this.setState({ beer: response.data })) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } render() { const { beer } = this.state return ( { !this.state.beer ?
